main event: A farmer reported seeing a cigar-shaped UFO emitting a reddish-orange glow near Fayetteville, Arkansas on 24 August 1965.
interesting points: The UFO was approximately 35-40 feet long and moved at a high rate of speed in a northeasterly direction., The observation lasted for about 20-30 seconds before the object disappeared from sight., Physical evidence obtained included a piece of a black plastic bag containing foreign material., The investigation suggested the UFO might have been a prank or hoax., No reports of UFO activities were recorded by local authorities during the sighting period.
sighted object: cigar-shaped UFO emitting a reddish-orange glow
